content: this legal document called rep n° eot deed confirmation was issued on november 24 2022 it involves a notary named master vt in 2007 a couple got married without a marriage contract and were automatically under the legal regime of community property they later decided to get a divorce and went through the necessary legal procedures in july 2022 a notary executed a document confirming the division of their rights and assets which was registered in dendermonde the document describes the progress of a cause involving the transfer of a property specifically a dwelling house and land the property is currently owned by mr with an estimated value of €330000 mrs received an advance payment of €2389845 from mr which will be discharged upon the finalization of their divorce both parties will provide the necessary documents to fulfill this condition once the divorce is finalized mrs will receive the full acquisition price the document also mentions a payment made by mr through a notary resulting in a discharge of a debt the parties have requested a reduction in registration fees and the conditions for the division surrender have been met a fee of 100 euros was paid for the deed which will be automatically registered by the general administration patrimonial documentation the parties have chosen their residences for the execution of the deed and their identity and civil status have been confirmed by the notary they have been informed of their rights to seek legal counsel if conflicts of interest arise power of attorney has been granted to handle tax declarations related to the deed the parties have signed the document after a full reading and explanation and certified copies have been made
